refnamediv.refpurpose: Prepares a statement for execution and returns a statement object

refentry.refsect1:
Description
PDOStatementPDO::prepare stringstatement intoptions
&warn.experimental.func;
Prepares an SQL statement to be executed by the statement-handle PDO::execute method. The SQL statement can contain zero or more named (:name) or question mark (?) parameter markers.
Prepare and execute an SQL statement
<?php /* Execute a prepared statement by passing an array of values */ $sth = $dbh->prepare('SELECT name, colour, calories FROM fruit WHERE calories < :calories AND colour = :colour'); $sth->execute(array(':calories' => 150, ':colour' => 'red')); ?>
